title: League of Legends Doesn't start
body: If I open the game the lol icon pops up and nothing happens. i tried every possible solution and none of them worked. I haven't played for 3 months now and it annoys me so much. I hope someone can help me.

replies.body:
League not being assigned the right system permissions is the most common reason why it's not able to launch. This is because League interacts with a ton of files outside of the League directory, therefore it needs permission from your Operating System in order to make those interactions. Our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) goes over the most common solutions to this issue.

Let me know if you still have this issue after working those steps.

> [{quoted}](name=dInAmItPoOl,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=PRhFsFpJ,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-08-15T07:50:41.446+0000)
>
> If I open the game the lol icon pops up and nothing happens. i tried every possible solution and none of them worked. I haven&#039;t played for 3 months now and it annoys me so much. I hope someone can help me.

open it as with admin permissions. if it doesn't work open it (normally) then close everything related to lol from task manager>processes and then open it again.
